mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.enclosure_num AS "enclosureNum", a.enclosure_type AS "enclosureType", a.enclosure_cont AS "enclosureCont", a.foregin_id AS "foreginId"
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM enclosure_tab a WHERE a.enclosure_type = #{enclosureType}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM enclosure_tab WHERE foregin_id=#{foreginId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO enclosure_tab( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, enclosure_num, enclosure_type, enclosure_cont, foregin_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{enclosureNum}, #{enclosureType}, #{enclosureCont}, #{foreginId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE enclosure_tab SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, enclosure_num = #{enclosureNum}, enclosure_type = #{enclosureType}, enclosure_cont = #{enclosureCont}, foregin_id = #{foreginId} WHERE id = #{id}
